forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 8am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 59. South wind 9 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Mostly cloudy. Low around 50, with temperatures rising to around 52 overnight. South southwest wind 10 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 44 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the day breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere feels thick with anticipation, carrying whispers of rain on the horizon. The clouds hover predominantly, casting a muted palette over the skyline, with an inkling of moisture that seems ready to awaken. A gentle breeze stirs at a steady pace, hinting at the shifts yet to come. As the high nudges near sixty degrees, one can sense the electric tension of the impending showers, scheduled to arrive later in the morning.

This gray cloak over the city, while perhaps uninviting, doesn't eclipse the charm of a morning spent wandering through the streets. Though the visibility may not stretch far, the muted surroundings create an intimate ambiance, ideal for discovering the hidden gems tucked within the city's embrace. For those brave enough to venture out, layering is advisable—light jackets over cozy sweaters would serve well against the brisk winds that may wrestle with unwelcome gusts throughout the day. As the raindrops begin to fall, consider a quiet café with well-brewed coffee, where you can savor the musical patter on the window while retreating from the chill beyond.
